title: 15 Online Side Hustles You Can Start With Zero Skills or Investment
description: Earn money online with no experience or startup costs. These 15 online hustles are perfect for beginners looking to make extra income.
alt: Person working on laptop from home doing side hustles

content.text: Want to make money online but don’t have any special skills or a budget to start? Good news you don’t need either. The internet is full of side hustle opportunities you can do from your phone or laptop, even if you're a complete beginner.
Here are 15 legitimate online hustles you can start today without any investment:
1. Online Survey Sign up for Swagbucks, InboxDollars, Survey Junkie, or Toluna. These platforms pay users for answering surveys and sharing opinions.
2. User Testing Websites Get paid to test apps and websites for usability on sites like UserTesting, TryMyUI, and Userlytics.
3. Microtasking Perform simple online tasks like categorizing images or proofreading small snippets on Amazon Mechanical Turk, Clickworker, or Remotasks.
4. App & Website Review Sites like TesterWork and uTest pay users to test digital products and give feedback.
5. Watch Ads & Videos Earn small amounts by watching promotional content on InboxDollars, Swagbucks, and PrizeRebel.
6. Get Paid to Read Emails With InboxPounds and Paid To Read Email, users receive paid promotional emails.
7. Cashback & Rewards Apps Use apps like Rakuten, Dosh, and Ibotta to earn money while shopping online.
8. Online Focus Groups Join sites like Respondent.io or User Interviews to earn up to $100+ per session giving your opinion.
9. Freelance with AI Tools Use free tools like Canva or ChatGPT to offer beginner services like blog post writing, social media designs, or virtual assistance on Fiverr or Upwork.
10. Sell Stock Photos If you have a smartphone, start taking and uploading pictures to sites like Shutterstock or Adobe Stock.
11. Review Products & Get Free Stuff Try Tomoson or Influenster to review products and earn perks.
12. Join Affiliate Programs Promote products with affiliate links using platforms like Amazon Associates or Impact.com. No blog required start with social media or forums.
13. Transcription Jobs Get started with basic transcription on Rev or GoTranscript no certification required.
14. Online Tutoring Help Assist students with basic homework questions using platforms like StudyPool or JustAnswer.
15. Write Product Descriptions Some eCommerce sellers on Fiverr and Upwork need help writing simple product listings or basic website copy.
These side hustles don’t require fancy degrees or startup funds just your time, consistency, and an internet connection.
